```{r load data, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
# rm(list = ls()) # clear environment

# load data

setwd("M:/PhD/Project/Experiment_Code/Straights") # set working directory
# setwd("C:/Users/Courtney/Documents/PhD/Project/Experiment_code/Straights")
temp = list.files(pattern = c("BenLui17_10", "*.csv")) # list all CSV files in the directory
myfiles = lapply(temp, read.csv) # read these CSV in the directory
workingdata <- do.call(rbind.data.frame, myfiles) # convert and combine the CSV files into dataframe

```

```{r adding demographic information to data frame}
library(dplyr)

workingdata <- workingdata %>%
  group_by(trialn) %>%
  mutate(gender = 1, age = 22, licenseTime = 53, contacts_glasses = FALSE) %>% # female = 1, male = 2; license time in months
  ungroup()

```

```{r saving new combined data frame}

write.csv(workingdata, file = "BenLui17_10_full.csv")

```
